description: Demonstrates orchestrator spawning multiple agent types in a coordinated workflow

visibility.bannerMessage: ðŸ¤– Running example prompt: Multi-Agent Workflow - This demonstrates cross-agent collaboration

plan.reasoning: This example demonstrates the orchestrator coordinating multiple specialized agents to complete a complex task. We'll have a research agent gather market data, a coding agent build a dashboard, and a productivity agent document the process. This showcases how the orchestrator delegates and coordinates between different agent types.

tasks.description: Research current trending JavaScript frameworks in 2024: gather data on popularity metrics, GitHub stars, npm downloads, and community sentiment for React, Vue, Svelte, and Solid. Save research data to /tmp/exprompt_playground.

Create a simple HTML dashboard in /tmp/exprompt_playground that visualizes the research data with charts showing framework popularity trends, including a responsive layout and interactive elements. All file operations and terminal commands must use /tmp/exprompt_playground as the working directory.

Create a comprehensive project README in /tmp/exprompt_playground documenting the dashboard features, how to run it locally, data sources, and future enhancement ideas. Save documentation to /tmp/exprompt_playground.
Add a TODO item to track future enhancements like adding more frameworks, implementing real-time data updates, and creating a comparison feature. Store TODO in project memory.

Perform final review in /tmp/exprompt_playground: check dashboard functionality, verify all data is properly displayed, ensure documentation is complete, and create a summary of what was accomplished. All file operations must use /tmp/exprompt_playground as the working directory.
